name: Hunt the Crumpus
description:
ADVENTURES OF RAT (VOL I): HUNT THE CRUMPUS: GAIDEN

in this EXPLORATION game, hunt down the legendary CREATURE that has plagued your town for centuries... while finding all sorts of OFF-KILTER creatures and places.

will you find the legendary crumpus? what is a crumpus anyway?? maybe it's like a krampus??? only by playing can you reveal the mystery...

made for the bitsy community secret santa (2020), for bigverylargerat

hope you enjoy <3
